1.content:
Every day felt the same, just another slog to get through. It wasn't hard being one of the most basic members of an army for hire. It was especially hard knowing that you were completely disposable cannon fodder, and were more likely to see yourself slain in whatever upcoming battle was next than live to see yourself grow old. They were a realm hopping group of trained soldiers yes, but that had long since lost it's luster. These were fears you lived with every day, but in time it all became habit.

Though lately, you'd been having dreams. A woman would approach you and start to tell you something but you'd wake up before she could get into any details. But not this time, no, you remembered that dream today. The woman in the dream told you that she'd be bestowing a gift upon you, a gift that could change your life forever: you could now take any other life of your choosing. It sounded like a wild fantasy, but at this point you were willing to try just about anything. Why not? If you felt you were going to die anyway, what did you have to lose trusting some strange dream?

All that was left now, was to choose your target.
1.title: In the beginning...

11.content: It seemed like your next destination was the world of Awakening, where the army was from originally. It seemed like you'd been hired to fight on behalf of the Halidom of Ylisse, and that presented a perfect opportunity to test out your supposed new powers.

info.brief_description: You're a for hire grunt in the worlds of FE, and you've just gained a mysterious power.
info.description:
In this story you are just an average male soldier in an army for hire in the various realms of Fire Emblem. You have a mysterious dream one night, where you are bestowed the power to possess the women of the FE realms. While you are possessing people, your body runs on auto pilot and you're given free reign to do whatever you like!

Characters:

Eric - You, our main character. He's part of an army for hire that gets sold to whomever is willing to pay the highest. An average unassuming slacker who'd rather not be putting your life at risk. You're okay with a sword, but all you want to do is to try and not get yourself killed.

Rodrick - Your friend, who's been with you for years. A friendly guy in a harsh world. A good looking guy with short dark brown hair, a fairly muscular build, and excellent with a bow. He's joined you many times with your 'woman watching', and nearly as perverted as you are.

Alexia - The General of the army, a strict and no-nonsense boss who is willing to work for anybody that pays hard enough. A fierce redheaded warrior woman with the physique to match. She's beautiful as she is tough as grit, and her skill with a sword is matched only by the beauty of her long red hair. She's not a big fan of you or Rodrick, finding you both to be slackers.

Rules of the story:
1. No killing off the MC.
2. You cannot possess the male characters or non human creatures.
3. Anything goes for sex.
4. Everybody in the story is at least 18 years old.

Feel free to add new chapters! I encourage it so I'm not just adding to it myself. Heck I might even give away some points for it!
